trans-unit.source: Provides a string that describes an individual configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 提供描述個別組態屬性的字串。

trans-unit.source: The SettingsDescriptionAttribute is intended to assist both design time tools and administrative run time tools in identifying and describing the associated configuration property.
trans-unit.target: SettingsDescriptionAttribute 被為了協助識別並描述相關聯的組態屬性中的設計階段工具和系統管理的執行的階段工具。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is optional and can only be applied at the individual configuration property level.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性是選擇性的並只能套用在個別的組態屬性層級。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Although the description has a theoretical maximum length of the <xref:System.String> class, whose length is represented by a <xref:System.Int32>, the following two practical considerations will limit the size of the `description` parameter: - Large text descriptions are difficult to display in a user interface (UI) and difficult for the user to read.
trans-unit.target: 雖然描述的理論上的最大長度為<xref:System.String>類別，其長度由<xref:System.Int32>，下列兩個實際考量會限制的大小`description`參數:-大型文字描述會很難了使用者介面 (UI) 中顯示並供使用者閱讀困難。</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - Settings providers may enforce overall usage quotas and are required to enforce user configuration quotas.
trans-unit.target: 設定提供者可以強制執行整體使用量配額，而且需強制執行使用者設定配額。

trans-unit.source: Gets the descriptive text for the associated configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的組態屬性的描述性文字。

trans-unit.source: The Description property is set by the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 描述屬性的設定方式<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the descriptive text for the associated configuration property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含相關聯的組態屬性的描述性文字。</xref:System.String>
